gen:link.msg:message: v5848_h: (Hierarchy GA1) [Not applicable/All geographical areas] must be equal to +[ALBANIA] +[BULGARIA] +[Countries not relevant for MKR purposes] +[CZECH REPUBLIC] +[DENMARK] +[HUNGARY] +[JAPAN] +[MACEDONIA, THE FORMER YUGOSLAV REPUBLIC OF] +[NORWAY] +[POLAND] +[ROMANIA] +[RUSSIAN FEDERATION] +[SERBIA] +[SWEDEN] +[SWITZERLAND] +[TURKEY] +[UKRAINE] +[UNITED KINGDOM] +[UNITED STATES] +[CROATIA] +[EGYPT] +[ICELAND] +[LIECHTENSTEIN] +[Euro area] --> [C 21.00 (r010, c070)] {{s001}} = +{{s029}} + {{s004}} + {{s042}} + {{s006}} + {{s007}} + {{s013}} + {{s030}} + {{s031}} + {{s038}} + {{s021}} + {{s023}} + {{s032}} + {{s033}} + {{s027}} + {{s034}} + {{s035}} + {{s036}} + {{s028}} + {{s037}} + {{s043}} + {{s039}} + {{s040}} + {{s041}} + {{s044}} FAILS because iaf:numeric-equal({eba_fmt:interval($a)}, iaf:sum(({eba_fmt:interval($b)}, {eba_fmt:interval($c)}, {eba_fmt:interval($d)}, {eba_fmt:interval($e)}, {eba_fmt:interval($f)}, {eba_fmt:interval($g)}, {eba_fmt:interval($h)}, {eba_fmt:interval($i)}, {eba_fmt:interval($j)}, {eba_fmt:interval($k)}, {eba_fmt:interval($l)}, {eba_fmt:interval($m)}, {eba_fmt:interval($n)}, {eba_fmt:interval($o)}, {eba_fmt:interval($p)}, {eba_fmt:interval($q)}, {eba_fmt:interval($r)}, {eba_fmt:interval($s)}, {eba_fmt:interval($t)}, {eba_fmt:interval($u)}, {eba_fmt:interval($v)}, {eba_fmt:interval($w)}, {eba_fmt:interval($x)}, {eba_fmt:interval($y)}))) is not true
